description:
Emotional Intelligence - It's a skill - It can be developed

This course will show you how

Come with me on a journey to fast-track your workplace success....in only 2 hours!

Emotional Intelligence in the workplace is a step-by-step program for increasing your emotional intelligence in the following four core skills: self-awareness, self-management, social awareness, and relationship management.

For the first time you can take part in a program that will help you identify your emotional intelligence skills, increase these skills and benefit from a healthier, happier career.

You'll also have the opportunity to complete a highly regarded emotional intelligence test to show you where your emotional intelligence is right now.

Every single technique which I reveal in this course is easy to put into place in minutes - and can give you instant returns.

Would You Like To:

  • Identify specific behaviours that hold you back at work?
  • Pinpoint strategies that will increase your success at work?
  • Develop a practical pathway to build new skills?

This course will arm you with everything you need to increase your emotional intelligence skills.

90% of top performers are high in emotional intelligence, and emotional intelligence is 2x more important than IQ in getting where you want to go in your career.

Can you afford to ignore it?

Enrol Now!
title: Success: Achieve Career Success With Emotional Intelligence
